abstract: The item is placed in the keyboard section.
overview:
## Discussion

On iOS, keyboard items are above the software keyboard when present, or at the bottom of the screen when a hardware keyboard is attached.

On macOS, keyboard items will be placed inside the Touch Bar.

A `FocusedValue`can be used to adjust the content of the keyboard bar based on the currently focused view. In the example below, the keyboard bar gains additional buttons only when the appropriate `TextField` is focused.

items.description: Places the item in the leading edge of the top bar.
items.name: topBarLeading

items.description: Places the item in the trailing edge of the top bar.
items.name: topBarTrailing

items.description: Places the item in the bottom toolbar.
items.name: bottomBar

items.description: Places the item in an ornament under the window.
items.name: bottomOrnament

items.name: accessoryBar(id:)
